p: Blood was drawn from each rat by intracardiac puncture just before they were sacrificed. The blood samples were transferred into tubes, centrifuged at 3000× g for 10 min, and dissociated to serum. The acquired serum samples were kept in tubes at −80 °C until analysis. IL 1β and RANKL (E0119Ra and E0289Ra respectively; Bioassay Technology Laboratory, Shanghai, China) levels were analyzed using ELISA kits in accordance with the manufacturer’s instructions.
